video.title: Highlight: Twitch Plays (Viewers play/Chat plays) Paper Mario TTYD on an actual Wii Day 0, Hour 0 to 12, type !help to learn how to play

message.body: oh shit, new game and script?

fragments.text: oh shit, new game and script?

message.body: @FinalKuja Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Z, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (Analog Stick), Cup, Cdown, Cleft, Cright (C Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright, (D Pad). Typos work too!

fragments.text: @FinalKuja Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Z, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (Analog Stick), Cup, Cdown, Cleft, Cright (C Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright, (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 3 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: "B+Up+Cright" will press the B Button, pull Up on the Analog Stick and pull Right on the C Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark.

fragments.text: Up to 3 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: "B+Up+Cright" will press the B Button, pull Up on the Analog Stick and pull Right on the C Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds, but you can end your input with - to execute the inputs indefinitely until the next input comes. Alternatively, you can type Wait or Stop to stop the execution of a held input.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds, but you can end your input with - to execute the inputs indefinitely until the next input comes. Alternatively, you can type Wait or Stop to stop the execution of a held input.

message.body: Example: "A+Z+Right-" will hold the Buttons A and Z and will pull Right on the Analog Stick. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Analog Stick.

fragments.text: Example: "A+Z+Right-" will hold the Buttons A and Z and will pull Right on the Analog Stick. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Analog Stick.

message.body: You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. It is needed at least 75% of votes on either side to change input modes, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. It is needed at least 75% of votes on either side to change input modes, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Basic mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Basic mode.
